General_information.Content: This database contains data from international key comparisons for radionuclide metrology since the inception of the international system of reference (SIR) for radionuclide metrology at the BIPM in 1976.

References.key: Romain Coulon et al 2022 Meas. Sci. Technol. 33 024003 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/ac3fc4

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Cd-109(2003)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Ratel G., Michotte C., BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Cd-109 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{109}$Cd and links for the 1986 international comparison CCRI(II)-K2.Cd-109, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/40/1A/06019}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2003, \textbf{40}, Tech. Suppl., 06019}

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Cd-109(2005)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Ratel G., Michotte C., Janssen, Kossert K., Lucas L. and Karam L.,Activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{109}$Cd for the PTB, Germany and the NIST, USA in the ongoing comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Cd-109, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/42/1A/06011}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2005, \textbf{42}, Tech. Suppl., 06011}

key.name: Eligible for the Key Comparison Reference Value (KCRV)
Activity measured by the laboratory / MBq
Date of the measurement by the BIPM international reference system (SIR)
Half-life used by the laboratory / d
Equivalent activity measured by the SIR / MBq
Relative standard uncertainty (SIR contribution) of the equivalent activity / 1e-4
Combined standard uncertainty of the equivalent activity / MBq
Initials of the person(s) who verified the data plus the date

Data_from_CMI-IIR-1978.Comments_on_the_equivalent_activity: Result not included in the KCRV because of potential impurity in the solution (see details in~\cite{KCRV_2003}.) and activity in the ampoule significantly lower than the minimum required for the SIR (45 MBq)
